column4: anyone know of any good tutorials for old people switching to ubuntu? my dad is switching later this week...
guys, I just wrote a nice tutorial for making gmail the default email caient in firefox
you know, that just applies to firefox, right?
if you can figure out a global thing, let us know :)
i haven't found a way for the whole system yet
well, you could enable POP in your gmail account, and set it up in Evolution or something
